name: Hired
description:
A game for the WondarJam game jam (Winter 2023 edition),
24-26 feb. 2023

« You are not the main character »

STYLES

Mandatory Styles (3/3) :

- Versus
- Dude, help me!
- Game in a game

DESCRIPTION

Despite his best efforts to put his plans into action, the Villain keeps being shut by the Main Character™. But now, he's going all in.

He hired YOU to setup a defense system in his way-too-exposed, way-too-labyrinthic Evil Warehouse. All you have to do is to hire goons and setup camera systems, in order to slow down the Main Character.

If he reaches your boss' room in time, you lose. Else, you win.

Controls:
- Right click to drag the camera
- Left click to buy or select something
- Space to start mini-games or continue dialogues

GAMEPLAY PERKS

- Buy systems and hire people to cover as many paths as possible.
- Click on the goons to send them somewhere.
- If they spot the Main Character, win the mini-game to gain some time.

CONFIG

The game is set to work on recent windows versions !

Every visual asset in the game was made during the Jam, same for every track and SFX ! Hope you'll appreciate' em!
